widget.name: Single Selector
widget.description: Widget to make a selection in a dropdown menu.

property.caption: Default value
property.description: Get the default value that has to be set.

property.caption: Default value label
property.description: The label attribute of the default value object.

property.caption: Options
property.description: All the objects you want to suggest as options.

property.caption: Options label
property.description: The label attribute of the option object.

property.caption: Context object label
property.description: Label attribute of the context object.

property.caption: Select option microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when a option is selected.

property.caption: Enable Create
property.description: Enable the Single Selector to create options when none are found when searching.

property.caption: Create value microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when a new value is created.

property.caption: Enable Clear
property.description: Enable the Single Selector to clear the selected value.

property.caption: Clear value microflow
property.description: Microflow to be executed when the selected value is cleared.

property.caption: Enable Searching
property.description: Enable the Single Selector to search for options.

property.caption: useDefaultStyle
property.description: Do you want to use the default styling?

property.caption: Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text for when there are no labels.
